name: HyperlinkTextSources

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Creates a new hyperlink text source.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The text or insertion point to hyperlink.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new HyperlinkTextSource (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the HyperlinkTextSource.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSource with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSource with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSource with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSources within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextSource, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextSource, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextSource, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HyperlinkTextSource, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSource with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the HyperlinkTextSource that follows the desired HyperlinkTextSource.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the HyperlinkTextSource whose index follows the specified HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The HyperlinkTextSource whose index comes before the desired HyperlinkTextSource.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every HyperlinkTextSource in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HyperlinkTextSource.
Returns the HyperlinkTextSource with the specified index.

description: A collection of hyperlink text sources.
